Plex.Description: A plugin that allows you to communicate with Plex.

Fields.ServerUrl-Help: The URL of the Plex server
Fields.AccessToken-Help:
The access token used to communicate with the Plex server.
https://github.com/revenz/Fenrus/wiki/Plex-Token
Fields.Mapping-Help: A list of mapping replacement used to paths in FileFlows with the paths that are used in Plex.

Outputs.2: Plex update request failed to send

PlexUpdater.Description: Sends a message to a Plex server to update the library.

Fields.ServerUrl-Help:
The URL of the Plex server.  If blank will use the Server defined in the Plugin settings.
Note: Only set this if you want to override the plugin settings server URL.
Fields.AccessToken-Help:
The access token used to communicate with the Plex server.
https://github.com/revenz/Fenrus/wiki/Plex-Token
Note: Only set this if you want to override the plugin settings access token.
Fields.Mapping-Help:
A list of mapping replacement used to paths in FileFlows with the paths that are used in Plex.
Note: This will not be used unless the Server URL is also set here, otherwise the plugin settings mappings will be used.
